Comment: The student has provided a well-structured and insightful response regarding Bible verses on ransom and redemption. The analysis of the verses demonstrates a solid understanding of the concept of redemption as portrayed in the Bible. The student effectively highlights key theological implications related to redemption, particularly focusing on Christ's sacrifice as the ultimate ransom payment. The additional theological considerations provided also enrich the overall discussion on redemption. Great work overall!
